Question
========
Which of the following are vector quantities? **Select all that apply.**


Answerlist
----------
* Electric charge.
* Electric potential.
* Electric potential difference (voltage).
* Electric potential energy.
* Electric force.
* Electric field.


Solution
========
Vectors: Electric (coulomb) force and electric field.  
Scalars: Electric charge, electric potential, electric potential difference (voltage), electric potential energy.
